title: haolian
author: haolian
content: Glory Hero is an easy-to-play multiplayer online battle arena that consists of a highly experienced technical team, who have advanced their careers and experiences in blockchain games. The team comes from a famous game manufacturer and publisher, Riot Game. Riot Game is an American game developer and publisher known for publishing the League of Legends, a multiplayer online battle arena game with highest players.Glory Hero is the rebirth of Paladin Strike but designed in a GameFi (Game Finance) space to offer players economic incentives to play and earn (P2E) as well as the privilege to set and create their own NFT image.Ever since our involvement with the game industry and advancing multifarious knowledge of MOBA, we have been involved in making Multiplayer Online Battle Arena games with more than 10 million players currently.In 2021, Glory Hero was formed and programmed in MOBA to create excellent games that will be easier to play and access. Since then, we have been able to cover diverse aspects of it, which can be seen in our roadmap.We are working on creating two more games this year using the MOBA format, which can be played as a single-player or with team members, thereby giving more privilege to gamers. We strive to build around the hero NFT, which empowers more games with higher profitability for both parties (programmers and players) to create more game techniques with a GameFi Metaverse. This has been our core goal and we look forward to achieving this goal of ours.With our highly regarded technical team and a strong ecosystem, players will discover the creation of NFT and will have the ability to empower more game scenarios as well as the ability to create the image of the hero.When players compete against opponents and succeed in defeating them, they get a $GHO token. This token is fully functional, decentralized and distributed fairly when players win a point. GHO tokens will be able to be exchanged for NFT and marketing of NFT in which players can buy a new Hero box.The GHO token has an advanced system that allows hero NFTs to gain trait and income bonuses. So, users who want such strong growth must spend the affiliated $GHO tokens, and the disbursed tokens will be 100% decimated. Players can also use GHO tokens to buy items to increase talent attributes.Our NFT marketplace is where players can exchange their NFTs with each transaction incurring a 5% transaction fee and consumption of 2.5% of the token by the platform to regulate the value of the GHO token.We have just begun our journey of building the worldâ€™s best MOBA economy. We are here to create a meaningful and evolving impact with our unique approach to NFT using blockchain. This is just the beginning!The Glory Hero GameThe Glory Hero game is our first game. Players earn in the form of glory. There will be different levels and stages that players can attain with different game experiences on the platform.There are different ways players can play the Glory Hero game, such as King mode, Push Tower mode, Summoning the Battlefield mode, and many more. Our games are accessible through the iOS, Android and Windows devices. This is to ensure that many players and teams will be able to effectively utilize and compete within the game platform. We have deployed an equal and fair distribution of the token economy within the game ecosystem to ensure tokens are fairly distributed among players and competitors.Our community will benefit more because we will invite other MOBA gamers and NFT creators to partner with us. Players can create the game map as well as hero features. These will make the ecosystem more user-friendly and well-diverse. We believe that those involved in the open community are passionately ready to create a better gaming adventure for all. At the same time, we will establish a marketplace where users can sell their hero avatars as an NFT.Glory Hero will bring a new metaverse ecosystem that will empower a large mass of programmers and players all in one shell. Currently, there are 20 NFT characters in the ecosystem with different levels. We are going to launch two more games this season. In the future, players can realize the creation of NFT and free to create the image of the hero.
